aboutme: I am an engineer who likes to be in contact with new technologies. I like to learn new things everyday in order to help clients on their business and technical challenges. <p/> The areas that I am interested in studying and building projects are Software development, Cloud Computing, Serverless computing, NoSql Databases, Internet of Things, Services Integration, Enterprise Architecture.

education.title: 1st place at Sua Idéia Vale 1 Milhão
education.description: The winning idea gave birth to Urbanizo

education.title: AWS Certified Solutions Architect

experience.title: Software Developer and Consultant
experience.value: LINKIT is a knowledge-driven IT-organisation specialized in delivering IT-sourcing solutions at multinationals and governmental organisations in a dynamic environment.

experience.title: JavaScript Developer - Backend (via LINKIT)
experience.value:
Part of the Jumbo Foodcoach backend team.
I work maintaining and developing NodeJS microservices on top of NestJS.

experience.title: JavaScript Developer - Frontend (via LINKIT)
experience.value:
Worked on the set-up and upgrade of the frontend during the transition ECI/BookSpot.
The project consists of a loosely coupled ReactJS application to an Intershop backend, using a modern and up to date stack: React 16, Webpack 4, Babel 7, Sass.

experience.title: Co-Founder and CTO
experience.value:
Urbanizo was a startup focused on bringing data intelligence to real estate market. It was invested by Buscapé in 2011 and acquired by Navent/ImovelWeb in 2015.
I led the technical team while taking part of product and software development. Took part on negotiations to raise $500K funding.

experience.title: Sr. Web Servers administrator
experience.value: Deployment, tunning, backup, disks/logs maintenance, load balancing, cache, High Availability of the OC4J, Weblogic and Jboss servers.

experience.title: Intern
experience.value: Worked as a presales consultant. Helped clients architecting solutions, conducting POCs and made customer presentations supporting sales managers.

skills.comment: Once there, you can't go back
API Gateway, λ, Dynamo, S3, SQS, SNS
